mapper.update: UPDATE wallet_info a, wallet_change_record b SET rmb = IF( b.record_status = 1, rmb + b.record_price, rmb - b.record_price ) WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND b.record_id = '${record_id}'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.record_price),0) day_income FROM wallet_change_record a WHERE a.member_no = '${member_no}' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%y-%m-%d ') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') AND a.record_status = 1) a, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.record_price),0) month_income FROM wallet_change_record a WHERE a.member_no = '${member_no}' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%y-%m ') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') AND a.record_status = 1 ) b, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.record_price),0) year_income FROM wallet_change_record a WHERE a.member_no = '${member_no}' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') AND a.record_status = 1 ) c
